element.name: GetRankType
element.short: Get the rank type from the taxon ranks table

element.short: Format scientific names based on taxon rank using HTML tags

element.short: Load taxon ranks to a list

element.name: RewriteTaxonHierarchy
element.short: Rewrite the taxon hierarchy in all tables

element.name: SplitTaxon
element.short: Split a subspecies to a species of their own

element.name: LumpTaxon
element.short: Lump a species as subspecies of another species

element.name: UpdateScientificName
element.short: Update scientific name of a taxon

element.name: UpdateEnglishName
element.short: Update english name of a taxon

element.name: UpdatePortuguesName
element.short: Update portuguese name of a taxon

element.short: Update other portuguese names of a taxon

element.name: UpdateSpanishName
element.short: Update spanish name of a taxon

element.name: UpdateAuthorship
element.short: Update the authorship of a taxon

element.name: UpdateDistribution
element.short: Update the geographical distribution of a taxon

element.name: UpdateExtinction
element.short: Update the extinction status of a taxon
